mapper.sql: id, name, interest_describe, type, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark
mapper.select: SELECT i.name,i.id FROM customer c LEFT JOIN customer_interest ci ON c.customer_id=ci.customer_id LEFT JOIN interest i ON ci.interest_id=i.id WHERE c.customer_id=#{customerId};
mapper.insert:
insert into interest
id,
name,
interest_describe,
type,
create_time,
modify_time,
create_man,
modify_man,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update interest
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interest_describe = #{interestDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update interest set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interest_describe = #{interestDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
